alert.note: Alert for Northern Clearwater Mountains; Southern Clearwater Mountains (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Missoula (Western Montana and Central Idaho)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 14 at 2:50AM MST until February 15 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Missoula
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 4 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 10 AM PST TUESDAY ABOVE 2500 FEET... * WHAT...Snow expected above 2500 feet. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 6 inches. * WHERE...Elk River, Highway 11 Pierce to Headquarters, Pierce, Dixie, Elk City, and Highway 12 Lowell to Lolo Pass. * WHEN...From 4 PM this afternoon to 10 AM PST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be affected.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Northern Clearwater Mountains; Southern Clearwater Mountains
